Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of lanes dedicated to Fort Lee, stating that there are three lanes dedicated to the town when in reality there are only two local-access lanes.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide any evidence or data to support the statement about the number of lanes dedicated to Fort Lee.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that having three lanes dedicated to Fort Lee is excessive or unfair without providing any context or justification for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider any alternative explanations for the lane closures or the allocation of lanes to Fort Lee.
